name: Raymond (Mnzo)
description:
Raymond is a game jam experience, made on Unity for PC (during the Jam Nations season 0 at Montréal).

In this game, player follows a persistent storyline in which he has to help Raymond take his bus by adjusting his position between different depth layers.

"Hi i'm Raymond! Help me to survive the asian black bear in order to catch my bus in time!"

Development - Enzo Menegazzi

3D Art - Jean-Ismaël Hamadene

2D Art - Julien Leuliet

Level Design & Narration - Arnaud Guillard

Sound Design - Dan St-Jean

Musics - Medhat Hanbali
